text.value: What is the coverage status of the child?
Lack of money to pay for transport
Thought it was necessary to be enrolled at the hospital first
Condition improved and discharged by the programme
Do you think your child is [see hint]?
Was your child previously treated / given products / ration for [see hint] at the health centre?
Questionnaire for the carers of children (MAM and SAM cases) who are NOT in the programme
There is no one else to take care of the other siblings
Mother / carer cannot carry more than one child
Mother / carer feels ashamed or shy about coming
Discharged because child was not recovering
The child has been rejected by the programme already
Other parent's children have been rejected
The child has been rejected by the programme already
What was used to verify coverage status of child?
Why is your child not receiving this treatment / products / ration for [see hint]?
How many children age 6-59 months live in this household?
If all children age 6-59 months in household have been assessed, **thank mother / carer** and **move to next household**
Other parent's children have been rejected
Mother / carer cannot carry more than one child
Please enter information for each child age 6-59 months in household. Click on + to move to next child.
There are no children age 6-59 months in this household. Move to next household.
Do you think your child is sick?
Mother / carer went to the health centre but the child was not measured
What is the nutritional status of the child?
Does not think the programme can help child/children (prefer traditional healer, other treatment)
Heard that children who took treatment/ration/products got diarrhoea
Do you know / are you aware of treatment / products / ration provided for [see hint] children at the health centre (or other distribution sites)?
Thought it was necessary to be enrolled at the hospital first
Does not think the programme can help child/children (prefer traditional healer, other treatment)
Heard that children who took treatment/ration/products got diarrhoea
Lack of money to pay for transport
There is no one else to take care of the other siblings
Why is your child not receiving treatment now?
Mother / carer feels ashamed or shy about coming
Discharged because child was not recovering
Condition improved and discharged by the programme
What condition is your child suffering from?
Is child in SFP or OTP?
Mother / carer went to the health centre but the child was not measured

bind.calculate: if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 1"), 1, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 2"), 2, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 3"), 3, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 4"), 4, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 5"), 5, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 6"), 6, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 7"), 7, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 8"), 8, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 9"), 9, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 10"), 10, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 11"), 11, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 12"), 12, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 13"), 13, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 14"), 14, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 15"), 15, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 16"), 16, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 17"), 17, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 18"), 18, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 19"), 19, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 20"), 20, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 21"), 21, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 22"), 22, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 23"), 23, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 24"), 24, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 25"), 25, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 26"), 26, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 27"), 27, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 28"), 28, if(selected( /liberiaCoverage/admin/vname , "Village 29"), 29, 30)))))))))))))))))))))))))))))

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Enumerator ID must be between 1 and 30

bind.calculate: if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/muac <115 or /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/oedema ='1', 'SAM', if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/muac >=125 and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/oedema ='2', 'not MAM not SAM', 'MAM'))

if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/status ='SAM' and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/in ='2', 'SAM in OTP', if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/status ='SAM' and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/in !='2', 'SAM not in OTP', if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/status ='MAM' and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/in ='2', 'Recovering SAM', if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/status ='MAM' and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/in ='1', 'MAM in SFP', if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/status ='MAM' and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/in ='3', 'MAM not in SFP', if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/status ='not MAM not SAM' and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/in ='1', 'Recovering MAM', if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/status ='not MAM not SAM' and /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/in ='2', 'Recovering SAM', 'not acutely malnourished')))))))

if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/coverage_status ='SAM not in OTP' or /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/coverage_status ='MAM not in SFP', 'Child not in appropriate treatment. Administer questionnaire on barriers to service uptake and access.', 'STOP survey for this child. Click + to move to next child age 6-59 months in household.')

bind.relevant: /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/coverage_status ='SAM not in OTP' or /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/coverage_status ='MAM not in SFP'

bind.calculate: if( /liberiaCoverage/child_repeat/child_data/coverage_status ='SAM not in OTP', 'Refer child to nearest OTP', 'Refer child to nearest SFP')

input.hint: Do a verbal census to ascertain how many children 6-59 months in household

select1.hint: Ask mother / carer if child is in SFP or OTP.
Verify child's coverage status by asking for health card or packets of RUTF/RUSF
Use case finding terms describing malnutrition / not growing well / not good weight / swollen feet
Use case finding terms describing malnutrition / not growing well / not good weight / swollen feet

select.hint: Use case finding terms describing malnutrition / not growing well / not good weight / swollen feet; Do not prompt. Probe with "Any other reasons?"

select1.hint: Use case finding terms describing malnutrition / not growing well / not good weight / swollen feet

select.hint: Do not prompt. Probe with "Any other reasons?"
